sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as integer,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1

transformations.name: Window1
transformations.script:
DerivedColumn1 window(over(dummy),
	asc(combo, true),
	RANK = rank(combo)) ~> Window1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Window1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		RottenTomato = {Rotton Tomato},
		dummy,
		combo,
		RANK
	))~> Select1
